text:
Priyanka dives into mobile series

Priyanka Chopra has joined hands with an entertainment mobile App and celebrity digital network to create mobi-series It’s My City .

Created by Fluence and produced in association with Priyanka’s production company, Purple Pebble Pictures and Endemol India, the bi-weekly series will be available on nexGTV.

“Digital is the new frontier of content and I am diving right in. It’s a super-exciting world in which I find myself equally fascinated with and immersed in completely,” Priyanka said.

The 14-episode show revolves around the everyday lives and struggles of four young girls — Manika, Sonali, Tina and Nikki — living together in a flat in Mumbai. — PTI
title: ENT-PRIYANKA
